song.title: Follow Your Dreams
song.info:
[b]Punqtured's comments:[/b]
This is probably the worst piece of music I've ever done. Can't really find any inspiration, but wanted to get as much of that one sample, as possible.
It might not make any sense at all to you, but it really made a difference to me. And that's what really matters afterall :) Hope you like it too.
Hope you enjoy and ... P A N T S O F F
Download link: [url]http://www.scene.org/file.php?file=%2Fparties%2F2013%2Fevoke13%2Fmmul_onesample%2Fpunqtured-follow_your_dreams.zip&fileinfo[/url]
